description:
Kevin & Melanie Attree are proud to present 418 Beenyup Road, Banjup to the market.

This exquisite quality built residence sits on 2.04 hectares of glorious land, presenting as brand new and has been finished with first class fixtures and fittings throughout.

As you drive up to the property you are greeted with limestone steps up to an impressive wrap around verandah UMR with exposed aggregate pavers, LED downlights and Dahua doorbell video intercom system. Walk through the unique wooden pivot door to the extra wide, light and bright entry hallway with polished porcelain tiles, recessed ceilings, LED downlights and skirting boards.

The master suite is off to the right through double French doors and offers plush carpets, skirting boards, His & Hers walk in robe with full fitted out storage, large windows, shear blinds and quality curtains. The lavish ensuite oozes class with floor to ceiling polished tiles, beauty lights, glass screen shower doors with in built foot niche and towel rails.

Off to the left is the separate home office/study which has double French doors to the main hallway and an additional door to the minor bedrooms making it an ideal space for working at home or as a great space for teenagers to complete their homework.

WOW! What a kitchen! Overlooking the family, dining and outside entertainment areas is this beautiful chef's kitchen packed with quality appliances and features including Quantum Quartz bench top with waterfall edges and breakfast bar, NEFF oven, black ceramic glass cooktop & 900m rangehood, NEFF full steam oven, Bosch dishwasher, scullery, ducted vacuum sweep inlet and plenty of overhead and below bench cupboards and drawers.

The main hub of the home encompasses the family, dining and theatre room allowing for views to the serenity of the gardens. Outside offers multiple zones for family entertaining including the massive alfresco entertaining patio UMR with LED downlights, ceiling fan and recessed ceilings overlooking lush lawns and gardens. Follow the steps down to a separate BBQ zone with raked alfresco roof, exposed aggregate paving and separate kids play zone with artificial turf and limestone retaining wall to enclose.

Additional Features Include:
- 31 Course Ceilings Throughout the Home
- Daikin Ducted Reverse Cycle Zoned Heating & Cooling Unit 19W, 8.0Hp, 13 Outlets, 8 Zones
- Massive 3 Phase 9m Span x 13.99m Long x 3.1m High Colourbond Workshop W/ 2x Roller Door Access & Pedestrian Door
- Reticulated Gardens & Lawns Off 3 Phase 3.0HP Grundfos Bore 33.0m
- Ducted EBS Compact 500 Vacuum System
- Edwards Hot Water System Panels & LGP Gas Booster
- Septic Tank – Recently Serviced
- Secure 4 Car Remote Garage

Situated in a fantastic location just around the corner from suburbia, with a great primary school nearby, close to all amenities, shops and the freeway – this one is a viewing must!

Contact Kevin & Melanie Attree on 0438 004 426 to register your interest.
